comments: horrible professor she hardly responds to your emails and is very unclear and critical, she grades unfair don\'t waist your time but after taking it I felt very discourage she only grades two unanimous chapter analysis, introduction and quizzes the rest of the assignments don\'t count so the rest of your hard work and time don\'t count.

comments: I took her online and I\'m very disappointed...she doesnt offer extra credit opportunities so whatever points you get you stick with it.She is not helpful at all,you\'re not allowed to work for a better grade.Her expectations are very high and its almost impossible to get an A in her class, only if you\'re an expert in the topic! Dont take her!!!

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I took her class over the winter semester. Everyone left that class sad, because it was so fantastic no one wanted it to end. All her directions were crystal clear, you could reach her very easily, her tests weren\'t tricky if you did the reading. She was a wonderful teacher, I would HIGHLY recommend this class or any other she teaches.
